wimarshana katayuthu awasan wu siddhin sambandhawa idiripath kota athi sankhya lekhana pariksha kirimedi, 2015 wasarata sapekshawa 2019 wasaredi sthri dushana ha barapathala lingika apayojana siddhin 17.7% kinda, lama apachara sambandha siddhin 27.6% kinda, pahatha watimak sidu wi athi namuth 2020 wasare mul dina 15 thula wartha wi athi siddhin sankhyawa anuwa peni yanne meya barapathala thaththwayak bawata wardhanaya wemin pawathina bawayi.

katunayaka guwanthotupola sandaha ee - pasport kramayak handunwadima sandaha me wana wita awashya kriyamarga ganimin sitina bawath jathyanthara siwil guwan sewa sanwidhanaya wisin sidukarana lada wiganana parikshanayakadi shri lanka siwil guwan sewa adhikariya dakunu aasiyawe siyalu ratawal abibawa palamu sthanaya dina gena athi bawath prawahana saha siwil guwan sewa amathya nimal siripala da silwa mahatha pawasiya.

parauni saki්raya chandrikawak pilibanda nasa aayathanaye chuayarupa samagin paryeshana wartha kihipayak antharjalayata mudahara atha. 2013 wasare juli masayedi pamana nasa aayathanaya mema chandrikawe samipa chuayarupa labaganimath samagama methek hora rahase kerunu paryeshanayan rausak karaliyata piwisiyeya.

yudewwange upakrama owuntama erehiwa prayojanayata ganimin eeshrayalayata erehiwa praharayak ella kirimata eejipthu janadhipathi anwar sadath, siriyanu janadhipathi hafis al-asad athulu arabi nayakayin wisin mewara thora gaththe 1973 wasare yudewwange me shuddha wu dinayayi.

me atharathura maksge birinda rogathurawima ohuta athi barapathala paharak wiya. 1881 desambar masaye 02 wanida maksge birinda jeni miya giyeya. 1883 pebarawari masaye maksge rogi thaththwaya uthsannawi ohuge shakthiya wegayen durwalawannata wiya.

wanija paramarthayen meratata genwana guwan bhanda katunayaka bandaranayaka guwanthotupaledima nidahas kirimata shri lanka rguwa piyawara gena atha.muslim janathawage ramasan uthsawaya hethuwen meratata genwana lada bhanda thogayak nidahas kirima pama wima hethuwen ema janathawa sidukarana lada paminillakata anuwa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha shri lanka reguwata ema bhanda guwanthotupaledima pariksha kara nidahas karana lesata mese upades di atha.methek wanija paramarthayen meratata ragena aa bhanada siyalla kolambaa regu wishesha wimarshana eekakayata genawith pariksha kirima sidukala athara memagin atham maginge bhanda pama wana bawata paminili labi thibini.antharjathika guwanthotupalaka wanija paramarthayen ragena ena bhanda pariksha kirima asiru bawa reguwa pawasana athara kese wethath nawa kramayata anuwa regu aagnya panathin reguwata pawari athi balathala walata anuwa bhanda pariksha kara bala nithi wirodhiwa ragena ena bhanda sandaha badu mudal saha dada mudal ayakara ganna bawa reguwa prakasha karayi.nithi wirodhiwa ragena ena lada bhanda raja santhaka kirimata piyawara ganna bawa kiyana reguwa labena thorathuru walata anuwa regu wishesha balakaya watalim sidukirimata piyawara ganna bawada reguwe usas niladhariyak dinaminata prakasha kaleya. .

shri lankawa pilibanda yojanawa gana sakachcha kerena mulika samanthara raswimak sikurada jiniwa nuwara eksath jathinge pradhana godanagille di pawathwina.nonila mattame sakachchawak wana mehi di yojanawata paksha saha wipaksha ratawal adahas dakwu bawa pawasu manawa himikam kriyadharayaku wana, sunanda deshapriya kiya sitiye shri lankawata erehiwa gena ena yojanawata pakisthanaya thadinma wiruddhawa karunu dakwu bawayi.shakthimath kirimaaprikanu ratawal - dakunu aprikawa ho me yojanawa gana kisiwak prakasha nokala bawa sandahan kala ohu pawasuwe supurudu paridi yuropiya ratawal yojanawata pakshawa katha karamin eya thawa duratath shakthimath kirima sandaha sanshodhana gena aa bawayi.wisheshayenma manawa himikam kshethraye di adhikaranaye swadhinathwaya pilibanda gatalu athulath kala yuthu bawath wagawim pilibanda yojana saha prajathanthrawadi aandu karanaya shakthimath kala yuthu bawath yuropiya ratawal wisin illa sitiye yayi, manawa himikam kriyadharayaku wana sunanda deshapriya prakasha kaleya.shri lankawata sama witama paksha rusiyawa, chinaya, pakisthanaya, kiyubawa, wenisiyulawa yana ratawalin idiripath wu yojanawalata prathiwiruddha prathichara pala wuye yuropiya ratawal walin bawayi ohu kiya sitiye.nihanda prathipaththiyakindiyawa mema sakachjawedi nihanda prathipaththiyak anugamanaya kala bawath bangladeshaya yam yam sanshodhana gena emin yojanawata ekanga nowana bawa kiya siti bawath ohu pawasuweya.anith hama ratakatamata wada pakisthanaya shri lanka aanduwa wenuwen itha shakthimathwa peni siti bawa sandahan kala manawa himikam kriyadharayaku wana sunanda deshapriya, shri lankawe sulu thara aagamika nidahasa sambandha yojanawa sampurnayenma ahosi karana lesa pakisthanaya illa siti bawa pawasuweya.ewani prashnayak shri lankawe suluthara aagamikayanta nomathi bawa pakisthanaya kiya siti bawayi ohu sandahan kale.shri lanka rajaya yojanawa pilinoganna bawath eeta wiruddha bawath ema yojanawa shri lankawe swadhipathyayata angili gasimak bawa, mulinma raswima amathu jiniwa hi ekasath jathinge shri lanka nithya niyojitha rawinatha aaryasinha pawasu bawa ohu pawasuweya
